mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saledetails (saledetails_id, productname, productid, currency, numbers, unit, supplierid, suppliername, unitprice1, unitprice, salesamount, note, currency1, numbers1, purchaseamount, deliverytime, deliverystatus, signback1,hscode,drawback,dangerous,marks,note1,transportgood_id,productenname) values
(#{item.saledetails_id}, #{item.productname}, #{item.productid}, #{item.currency}, #{item.numbers}, #{item.unit}, #{item.supplierid}, #{item.suppliername}, #{item.unitprice1}, #{item.unitprice}, #{item.salesamount}, #{item.note}, #{item.currency1}, #{item.numbers1}, #{item.purchaseamount}, #{item.deliverytime}, #{item.deliverystatus}, #{item.signback1}, #{item.hscode}, #{item.drawback}, #{item.dangerous}, #{item.marks}, #{item.note1}, #{item.transportgood_id},#{item.productenname})
mapper.select: select saledetails.saledetails_id, products.CHINANAME as productenname, saledetails.productid, saledetails.currency, saledetails.numbers, saledetails.unit, saledetails.suppliername, saledetails.supplierid, saledetails.UNITPRICE1, saledetails.UNITPRICE, saledetails.salesamount, saledetails.note, saledetails.currency1, saledetails.numbers1, saledetails.purchaseamount, saledetails.deliverytime, saledetails.deliverystatus, saledetails.signback1, saledetails.hscode, saledetails.drawback, saledetails.marks, saledetails.note1, saledetails.transportgood_id, products.CASNUM as casnum, products.ENGLISHNAME as productname from saledetails inner join transportgood on transportgood.transportgood_id = saledetails.transportgood_id and transportgood.transportgood_id = #{id} inner join products on products.PRODUCTS_ID = saledetails.productid
